ygData.subject: Re: Gladiator Pages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I just wanted to say that Chris s site is very cool -- congrats! Great to know there are such devoted users :) As Chris said, if anyone does have sites, or
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 12
Message-ID: <17248.12.25.959279670@...>
Date: Mon, 02 Nov 1998 00:07:42 -0500
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Re: Gladiator Pages


>Does anyone out there have any personal pages devoted to Gladiator?  Any 
>pages will do, I'm not looking for anything exclusive.
>
>I'd really like to take a look at what maps other players have made, and 
>also how they play -- the strategies they use.
>
>I have a page up at 
>
>http://members.xoom.com/shayd/glad.html 
>
>for those who are interested in looking.  It just has some strategy on 
>clerics, mages, and thieves; no maps yet.  (Unfortunately all my good maps 
>were erased when I had to format my hard drive, but I'll be making more.)
>
>-Chris
>  / Shayd

I just wanted to say that Chris's site is very cool -- congrats! Great to know
there are such devoted users :)

As Chris said, if anyone does have sites, or know of others, mention them on
this list. I'll try to get a page up at some point with pointers to all the fan
sites that we know of.

--Tom
